settings.column_content: Laura Lombardi is built upon the principle of sustainability and has always used up-cycled and recycled materials in the creation of the brand’s products. The designer often sources and uses vintage deadstock materials in the collection, and all brass used in Laura Lombardi products is recycled. All plating is done in a 0-waste closed filtration system, and wherever possible pieces are made by hand in studio. The brand strives to source materials responsibly, create products with care, and design with the wearer’s values and lifestyle in mind.
